Record.Value: Basic Fabrication
In this lesson, you will learn how to fabricate new items and machines.
Stop Lathen Around
Welcome back, Cadet. Today, we will be using the {THING:StructureAutolathe} to turn your newly made ingots into useful items and resources. Our first task will be simple.
Turn on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Select the {THING:ItemCableCoil} using the small arrow keys on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}, or click the yellow search button to search for the {THING:ItemCableCoil} and select it.
Pick up a {THING:ItemCopperIngot} from the orange crate.
To print the {THING:ItemCableCoil}, you will need to provide the {THING:StructureAutolathe} with the correct resources.
Place the {THING:ItemCopperIngot} in to the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Press the big green button on the {THING:StructureAutolathe} to start printing. Print 4 {THING:ItemCableCoil}.
Shiney New Sheets

Nice work, Cadet! The {THING:ItemCableCoil} will come in handy later on. Now, we will need to create some {THING:ItemIronSheets}. {THING:ItemIronSheets} are a key component in building most structures and machines.
Just like last time, select the {THING:ItemIronSheets} from the selection menu on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemIronIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemIronIngot} in to the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Print two {THING:ItemIronSheets}.
Plastic is fake
The next component you will need is {THING:ItemPlasticSheets}. {THING:ItemPlasticSheets} are needed to complete machines.
Select the {THING:ItemPlasticSheets} from the selection menu on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemSiliconIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemSiliconIngot} in to the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}
Print two {THING:ItemPlasticSheets}.
The Bending Machine
The {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender} is used to create pipes, vents, and other atmospherics structures.
Select the {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender} from the selection menu on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemGoldIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemGoldIngot} in to the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Print a {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender}.
The Pipebender
We can now build a {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}. Use the newly made {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender} and place it in the designated location.
Place the {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender}.
The Passive Vent

Using the printed components and what you have learned from the past tutorials, finish the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender} and power it up by connecting it to the power network using {THING:ItemCableCoil}. Then, print a {THING:ItemPassiveVent} using the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Complete the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Power up and turn on the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemIronIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemIronIngot} in to the left input slot on the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Select the {THING:ItemPassiveVent} from the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Print a {THING:ItemPassiveVent}.
